text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Following our big win, Biwa Hayahide<n>and I meet to devise
a plan of attack<n>for our next race.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
With these values, we can make a<n>prediction for the
upcoming race. Now<n>I'd like to review our data on the<n>
other runners.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
The key to the previous problem was<n>racer number four,
yes? We will refer<n>to the data of her past three races,<n>
and...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As usual, her theories are so<n>advanced that I can barely
keep up. I<n>furiously scratch into my notebook to<n>make
sure I don't get left behind.

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
Hey, check it out. Hayahide's talking<n>about some
super-complicated stuff.

text_block_list.name: Classmate B
text_block_list.text:
Wow, for real. As expected from one<n>of our school's top
brains. She's<n>really extraordinary... Out of our<n>league, for
sure.

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
How'd she get so smart though?<n>Maybe if I study harder, I
can be like<n>that too.

text_block_list.name: Classmate B
text_block_list.text:
No way—she's one of those people<n>who were just born
that way! We<n>could never be like her.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: "Extraordinary," huh?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Oh... It's nothing. Let's continue with<n>the meeting.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
However, for the rest of the<n>discussion, Hayahide
occasionally<n>looks like she's got something else<n>on her
mind.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Even after leaving the cafeteria, she<n>seems lost in thought.
choice_data_list:
Thinking about what those students said
earlier?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Ah... Actually, no. My apologies. It's<n>nothing.
choice_data_list: Come on, give me a try.
Come on, give me a try.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: It... it just feels strange beingdescribed as "extraordinary." Thatword infers that I'm special.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I always endeavor to follow logic, so<n>from the outside, I may
appear to be<n>doing difficult things...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
But I'm actually an average<n>person—one who had no other
tools<n>but reason to get into the academy.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
So I'm not worthy of such praise as<n>"extraordinary." It is
much better<n>suited for someone with natural<n>talent.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I'm sure by natural talent, shemust be referring to the Beast, NaritaBrian.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She may have complicated feelings<n>about her exceptional
sibling that<n>others wouldn't understand. But<n>even so...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She works tirelessly on developing<n>her unique strength. So I
tell her<n>straight-out what an amazing person<n>she is.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Thank you...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You're right. I'll sharpen my ability<n>even further, and
together we'll make<n>it through this battle. My<n>
determination remains firm.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
But you know, Trainer. As her big<n>sister... what I really
wanted was to<n>outperform her.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I'm embarrassed at myself for<n>foolishly chasing something
as<n>unattainable as natural talent.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As she looks off into the distance, I<n>can sense a lack of
self-confidence in<n>her eyes. I see that within her<n>
cool-headed self also lies fragility.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Ah, I'm sorry for droning on about<n>such a dull subject...
Anyway, it's not<n>on our schedule, but I'd like to<n>
incorporate what we drew from the<n>meeting into training.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Making corrections later will only<n>slow us down, so let's
verify the<n>formula first.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Biwa Hayahide's driven to keep<n>moving forward, and I feel
compelled<n>myself to find a way to give her<n>confidence.
